Class DatabaseElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.proximus.mmgr.Element
      • com.proximus.mmgr.hive.metastore.DatabaseElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementWritable

    public class DatabaseElement
extends Element
implements ElementWritable
    A sub-type of Elements that captures the Metadata of a HiveMetastore Database.
    Author:
    Jonathan Puvilland
